Port Nyanzaru.title: Festival Day
Port Nyanzaru.effect: Boost party morale and gain supplies.

Jungle.title: Giant Spiders
Jungle.effect: Players must save against poison or gain exhaustion.

Lake.title: Shimmering Lights
Lake.effect: Discover a hidden fishing spot and gain water supplies.

Lake.title: Sudden Storm
Lake.effect: Lose time and supplies due to the storm.

Swamp.title: Quicksand
Swamp.effect: Lose supplies and test navigation skills.

Swamp.title: Swamp Wraith
Swamp.effect: Encounter a hostile spirit draining the party's energy.

Coast.title: Pirate Raid
Coast.effect: Fend off a pirate raid to protect supplies.

Coast.title: Shipwreck
Coast.effect: Discover valuable resources at a shipwreck.

Mountain.title: Eagle Attack
Mountain.effect: Fend off a giant eagle attacking the party.

Wasteland.title: Sandstorm
Wasteland.effect: Lose supplies and visibility in a sudden sandstorm.

Wasteland.title: Scavengers
Wasteland.effect: Defend against scavengers trying to steal supplies.

Omu.title: Undead Horde
Omu.effect: Battle a group of undead creatures.

Omu.title: Hidden Trap
Omu.effect: Avoid or disarm traps hidden within the ruins.
